LanguageData.DeactivateOptions:
You are about to deactive the 'Options'-button.

If you do, you won't be able to reenter these mod settings and reactivate it. You will need to deactive the mod or change the config file.

Are you sure you want to deactivate it?

LanguageData.ShowLearningHelperDesc:
Toggle visibility of the learning helper when it is empty.

The learning helper is always visible if there is a concept activated to be learned. This toggle makes it disappear when no concept is active.

Note: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.ShowZonesDesc: Toggle visiblity of zones.\n\nNote: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.ShowBeautyDesc:
Toggle the beauty display.

Displays the beauty of the world as would be perceived by a character standing where the mouse is pointing.

Note: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.ShowRoomStatsDesc:
Toggle room stats display.

Displays room stats of the room where the mouse is pointing.

Note: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.ShowColonistBarDesc:
Toggle colonist bar.

Displays icons and basic status for all colonists along the top of the screen.

You can reorder the colonists in the colonist bar by right-click and dragging them.

Note: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.ShowRoofOverlayDesc: Toggle visibility of roofs.\n\nNote: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.AutoHomeAreaDesc: Toggle automatically expanding the home area around new constructions.\n\nNote: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.AutoRebuildDesc: Toggle automatic rebuild of destroyed structures in the home area.\n\nNote: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.ResourceReadoutCategorizedDesc: Toggle categorized mode on the resource readout.\n\nNote: This only toggles the button being shown, not the action of the button itself.
LanguageData.MouseoverReadoutDesc: Toggles the readout on displaying information about where the mouse is pointing.
LanguageData.TimeControlsDesc: Toggles the time controls.\n\nNote: This only toggles the buttons being shown, not the actions of the buttons themselves.
LanguageData.Alert_BilliardsTableOnWallDesc: Your billiards table is adjacent to an obstruction.
LanguageData.Alert_BrawlerHasRangedWeaponDesc: Your colonist has the Brawler personality trait, but is carrying a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.Alert_ExhaustionDesc: Your colonist is exhausted and needs rest.
LanguageData.Alert_FireInHomeAreaDesc: There is a fire in the home area.
LanguageData.Alert_HunterHasShieldAndRangedWeapon: Hunter Has Shield and Ranged Weapon
LanguageData.Alert_HunterHasShieldAndRangedWeaponDesc: Your hunter is using a ranged weapon and wearing a shield belt which prevents shooting at range.
LanguageData.Alert_HunterLacksRangedWeaponDesc: A colonist is assigned as a hunter but does not have a ranged weapon.\n\nThey will not hunt until they are carrying a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.Alert_HypothermiaDesc: Your colonist is suffering from hypothermia.
LanguageData.Alert_HypothermicAnimalsDesc: Your animal is suffering from hypothermia.
LanguageData.Alert_ImmobileCaravanDesc: Your caravan is immobile because it carries too much.
LanguageData.Alert_LifeThreateningHediffDesc: Your colonist is at risk of death because of severe illness.
LanguageData.Alert_LowFoodDesc: You are dangerously low on food.
LanguageData.Alert_MinorBreakRiskDesc: Your colonist is in a poor mood and may have a minor mental break at any time.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedBatteriesDesc: You have a solar or wind generator, but no batteries.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedColonistBedsDesc: You have more colonists than you have colonist beds.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedDefensesDesc: You've been here some time and have probably been seen. Pirate raids will start soon.\n\nYou should prepare defenses, like sandbags or traps.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedDoctorDesc: Your colonist needs medical care, but you have no healthy colonists assigned as doctors.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedJoySourcesDesc: Your colonist needs recreation variety. Provide recreation variety supplying a new, different kind of recreation.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedMealSourceDesc: You have no way of preparing proper meals from raw food.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedMinerDesc: You have designated some rocks to be mined, but no colonist has the Mining work type.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedResearchProjectDesc: You have the equipment to do research but have not selected a project.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedWardenDesc: You have a prisoner, but no colonist has the Warden work type.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedWarmClothesDesc: Your colonists will lack warm clothes when the cold season comes.
LanguageData.Alert_PasteDispenserNeedsHopperDesc: You have a nutrient dispenser with no hopper next to it.
LanguageData.Alert_NeedMinerDesc: You have designated some rocks to be mined, but no colonist has the Mining work type.
You have designated some rocks to be mined, but no colonist has the Mining work type.
LanguageData.Alert_ShieldUserHasRangedWeaponDesc: Your colonist has a shield belt and is carrying a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.Alert_TatteredApparelDesc: Your colonist is wearing tattered apparel, which is making her sad.
LanguageData.Alert_UnhappyNudityDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterThreatBigDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterThreatSmallDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterNegativeEventDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterNeutralEventDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterPositiveEventDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterDeathDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
LanguageData.LetterRansomDemandDesc: Your colonist is nude and not happy about it.
